plot: When an ex-girlfriend returns to capture one last memory, Jessica must face her lingering emotions amidst new hopes...and old truths.
title: Ur X Girlfriend
plot_es: When an ex-girlfriend returns to capture one last memory, Jessica must face her lingering emotions amidst new hopes...and old truths.
plot_en: When an ex-girlfriend returns to capture one last memory, Jessica must face her lingering emotions amidst new hopes...and old truths.
